home.description: A lightweight, powerful, and production-ready boilerplate for building modern static websites. Powered by Pug, SCSS, and ES6+

webpack.title: Webpack 5
webpack.description: Fully configured Webpack build system with Hot Module Replacement (HMR) for a fast development experience.

pug.title: Pug Templating
pug.description: Write cleaner HTML using Pug (formerly Jade). Includes layout inheritance, mixins, and variable support.

theming.title: SCSS & Theming
theming.description: Built-in support for SASS/SCSS. Features a custom flexible grid system and CSS Variables for easy Dark/Light mode switching.

js.title: JavaScript ES6+
js.description: Modern JavaScript support via Babel. Write modular code using ES6 imports/exports comfortably.

asset.title: Asset Management
asset.description: Automatic handling of images, fonts, and static assets. Optimized for production builds.

architecture.title: Clean Architecture
architecture.description: Organized folder structure separating logic, styles, and views. scalable for small to medium projects.
